entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. A few showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
